author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A timeless classic that captures the essence of the roaring twenties, filled with themes of love, wealth, and the American Dream.

author: George Orwell
review: A dystopian masterpiece that serves as a chilling warning about the dangers of totalitarianism and surveillance.

author: Harper Lee
review: A poignant exploration of racial injustice and moral growth, told through the eyes of a young girl in the American South.

author: J.D. Salinger
review: An iconic portrayal of teenage angst and rebellion, resonating with readers of all generations.

author: Jane Austen
review: A timeless romance that delves into societal norms and the complexities of love and marriage in early 19th-century England.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: An epic fantasy saga filled with rich lore, memorable characters, and a timeless battle between good and evil.
